mapper.insert: INSERT into knowlg_content (id, title, `desc`, content, type_id, second_type_id, state, read_num, create_id, create_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{title}, #{desc}, #{content}, #{typeId}, #{secondTypeId}, #{state}, #{readNum}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.type_id typeId, a.second_type_id secondTypeId, a.`desc`, a.content FROM knowlg_content a WHERE a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.content, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN '审核中' WHEN '2' THEN '审核通过' WHEN '3' THEN '审核不通过' END state, CASE a.state WHEN '1' THEN 'state-new' WHEN '2' THEN 'state-up' WHEN '3' THEN 'state-down' END colorClass, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') createTime, a.read_num readNum, c.`name` typeName, d.`name` secondTypeName FROM knowlg_content a, knowlg_type c, knowlg_type d WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.type_id = c.id AND a.second_type_id = d.id
